article_title: How a Sanders Medicare-For-All Plan Can Be Affordable and Appeal to Republicans

article_metadata.description: The New York Times recently ran a story entitled “Left-Leaning Economists Question the Cost of Bernie Sanders’s Plans.” The article featured the views of economists who are, I believe, predominantly supporters of Hillary and would, I presume, like to work in her Administration. I’m not a Sanders supporter. This said, I [...]
article_metadata.author: Laurence Kotlikoff
